liveOnly.label: Live Only Mode
liveOnly.tooltip: True if you want it to only run when you are live

permission.label: Permission level
permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for participating

minReward.label: Min reward
minReward.tooltip: Minimum ammount the user wins for writing the word first

maxReward.label: Max reward
maxReward.tooltip: Maximum ammount the user wins for writing the word first

wordInterval.label: Interval in minutes
wordInterval.tooltip: Interval in minutes before switching the word

responseAnnouncement.label: Word announcement message
responseAnnouncement.tooltip:
Message that will be posted when a new word is announced
 $word = The word
 $currency = Name of Currency

responseWon.label: User wins message
responseWon.tooltip:
Message that will be posted when the user writes the word first
 $word = The word
 $user = Username
 $reward = Winning reward
 $currency = Name of Currency
